qas.question: What is the the Information Management Group responsible for?

answers.text: electronic warfare and the protection of the Armed Forces' communications and computer networks

qas.question: Where is the Information Management Group located?
What is the task of the CAF Cyber Task Force?

answers.text: design and build cyber warfare capabilities

qas.question: When was the Directorate of Cybernetics established?

plausible_answers.text: electronic warfare and the protection of the Armed Forces' communications and computer networks

qas.question: What is the the Information Management Group not responsible for?
Where is the non-Information Management Group located?

plausible_answers.text: design and build cyber warfare capabilities for the Canadian Armed Forces

qas.question: What is the task of the non-Cyber Task Force?
When was the Directorate of Non-Cybernetics established?
Who was fired from the Directorate?

context: Among other things, the Information Management Group is responsible for the conduct of <a0_0><b5_0>electronic warfare and the protection of the Armed Forces' communications and computer networks<b5_0/><a0_0/>. Within the group, this operational role is fulfilled by the Canadian Forces Information Operations Group, headquartered at <a1_0><b6_0>CFS Leitrim in Ottawa<b6_0/><a1_0/>, which operates the following units: the Canadian Forces Information Operations Group Headquarters (CFIOGHQ), the Canadian Forces Electronic Warfare Centre (CFEWC), the Canadian Forces Network Operation Centre (CFNOC), the Canadian Forces Signals Intelligence Operations Centre (CFSOC), the Canadian Forces Station (CFS) Leitrim, and the 764 Communications Squadron. In <a3_0><b8_0>June 2011<b8_0/><a3_0/> the Canadian Armed Forces Chief of Force Development announced the establishment of a new organization, the Directorate of Cybernetics, headed by a Brigadier General, <a4_0>the <b9_0>Director General Cyber<b9_0/><a4_0/> (DG Cyber). Within that directorate the newly established CAF Cyber Task Force, has been tasked to <a2_0><b7_0>design and build cyber warfare capabilities<a2_0/> for the Canadian Armed Forces<b7_0/>.
